text: A sheepish grin curls over your lips as you decide to flip through the pages.
You find nothing of interest until about midway through the book.
One of the pages is marked with a strange looking symbol, vaguely resembling a tree.

name: Mom
text: Dear Diary, the harvest is almost upon us and I could not be more excited. Our Son is getting of age and it will be his first time taking part in the festivities!

name: Mom
text: And not only that, but it is very likely he will take center stage in them!

name: Mom
text: Oh I can barely hold my tears of joy, but I must not let him know, under any circumstances. He would not understand.
The pages immidatly following descibe a night your parents shared when you were visiting your grandparents.
You wish you hadn't opneded the book.
